summary: The diff does not implement the requested production promotion. It only updates `project_state.json` to record the request as pending, and does not modify `frontend/.release/production-version.txt` as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Promote draft version 73 to the Live/Production channel by ensuring `frontend/.release/production-version.txt` references draft version `73` (metadata-only; no `frontend/src/` changes).
missing_requirements.reason: No change is shown to `frontend/.release/production-version.txt`; the only modified file is `project_state.json`, which marks the request as pending rather than performing the promotion.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata to add a new_feature_request (AR-1) marked as pending and set `isFixRequest` true, plus included unrelated app behavior details in `summary`/`known_issues`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically to perform a metadata-only release promotion by updating `frontend/.release/production-version.txt`, not to alter project tracking metadata or classify the request as a fix request / record known issues.
